mapper.update: update community2eperson ce, eperson e, community c set ce.community_id = c.community_id, ce.eperson_id = e.eperson_id where ce.comm_syscode is not null and ce.eperson_syscode is not null and ce.community_id is null and ce.eperson_id is null and ce.comm_syscode = c.sys_code and ce.eperson_syscode = e.sys_code
